Why Choose One Single View?

Powerful features designed to simplify your insurance management

Single View of All Policies

Manage all your insurance policies across multiple insurers in one unified dashboard

Track Expiries in Advance

Get timely alerts and reminders before your policies expire, never miss a renewal

Centralized Document Storage

Securely store and access all policy documents, RCs, and claims in one place

Claim Support & Reminders

Simplified claim registration process with status tracking and support

Dedicated RM Support

Get personalized assistance from your dedicated Relationship Manager

Secure & Compliant

Enterprise-grade security with role-based access and audit trails
